Title: David and Lisa
Production_Co: Lisa and David Company, Vision Associates Productions
Cast: Keir Dullea, Janet Margolin, Howard Da Silva, Neva Patterson, Clifton James, Richard McMurray, Nancy Nutter, Mathew Anden, Jaime Sánchez, Coni Hudak, Karen Lynn Gorney, Janet Lee Parker
Plot: The emotional story of a young man in a mental institution for teens who begins to understand his psychosis in the environment of others with mental and emotional problems. He finds ... See full summary » The emotional story of a young man in a mental institution for teens who begins to understand his psychosis in the environment of others with mental and emotional problems. He finds intimacy with Lisa, a young woman suffering from dissociative identity disorder. Written by joe robertson <glossy@mail.utexas.edu>
Keywords: homosexual, homosexuality, mental institution, mental illness, teenager
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 5 wins & 5 nominations.
Location: Train Station, 67 E. Wynnewood Road & Penn Road, Wynnewood, Pennsylvania, USA
Actors: Keir Dullea, Janet Margolin, Howard Da Silva
Writer: Eleanor Perry (screenplay), Theodore Isaac Rubin (book) (as Theodore Isaac Rubin M.D.)
Description: Directed by Frank Perry.  With Keir Dullea, Janet Margolin, Howard Da Silva, Neva Patterson. The emotional story of a young man in a mental institution for teens who begins to understand his psychosis in the environment of others with mental and emotional problems. He finds intimacy with Lisa, a young woman suffering from dissociative identity disorder.
